entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
